languages.text: {n}Ярость Соломона рассыпается в прах перед {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}вашей стальной убежденностью{/d} в догматах Арбитес.{/n} "Что я наделал... Посмел пятнать долг вольнодумным суждением. Нет, я не еретик, а верный слуга Императора — до последнего вздоха".

{n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."
languages.original_text: {n}Ярость Соломона рассыпается в прах перед {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}вашей стальной убежденностью{/d} в догматах Арбитес.{/n} "Что я наделал... Посмел пятнать долг вольнодумным суждением. Нет, я не еретик, а верный слуга Императора — до последнего вздоха".

I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

languages.text: {n}你对帝国律法的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}忠诚坚不可摧{/d}。听了你的话，索罗蒙的怒火顿时烟消云散。{/n}“我到底做了什么啊……我的怀疑言论玷污了我身为法务官的职责。不，我绝不是异端分子。我会忠心耿耿地侍奉帝皇，直至生命的最后一刻。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}你对帝国律法的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}忠诚坚不可摧{/d}。听了你的话，索罗蒙的怒火顿时烟消云散。{/n}“我到底做了什么啊……我的怀疑言论玷污了我身为法务官的职责。不，我绝不是异端分子。我会忠心耿耿地侍奉帝皇，直至生命的最后一刻。”

languages.text: {n}高等裁定局の規範に対する{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたの揺るぎのない献身{/d}を前に、ソロモーンの怒りは粉々に砕け散った。{/n}「私は何をしていたのでしょう…反逆の言葉でアービトレイターの聖務に泥を塗ってしまいました。しかし、私は異端者ではありません。最後の息を引き取るまで皇帝の忠実なる僕です」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}高等裁定局の規範に対する{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたの揺るぎのない献身{/d}を前に、ソロモーンの怒りは粉々に砕け散った。{/n}「私は何をしていたのでしょう…反逆の言葉でアービトレイターの聖務に泥を塗ってしまいました。しかし、私は異端者ではありません。最後の息を引き取るまで皇帝の忠実なる僕です」

languages.text: {n}La ira de Solomorne se deshace frente a tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}devoción férrea{/d} al código del Adeptus Arbites.{/n} «¿Qué he hecho?... He deshonrado mi deber como Arbitrator con palabras de disidencia. No, no soy un hereje: soy un fiel sirviente del Emperador hasta el último aliento».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}La ira de Solomorne se deshace frente a tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}devoción férrea{/d} al código del Adeptus Arbites.{/n} «¿Qué he hecho?... He deshonrado mi deber como Arbitrator con palabras de disidencia. No, no soy un hereje: soy un fiel sirviente del Emperador hasta el último aliento».

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Zorn zerfällt angesichts {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}deiner eisernen Hingabe{/d} an den Kodex der Adeptus Arbites zu Staub.{/n} "Was habe ich getan ...? Ich habe die Pflicht des Arbitrators mit Worten des Widerspruchs entehrt. Nein, ich bin kein Ketzer – ich bin ein treuer Diener des Imperators, bis zu meinem letzten Atemzug."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Zorn zerfällt angesichts {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}deiner eisernen Hingabe{/d} an den Kodex der Adeptus Arbites zu Staub.{/n} "Was habe ich getan ...? Ich habe die Pflicht des Arbitrators mit Worten des Widerspruchs entehrt. Nein, ich bin kein Ketzer – ich bin ein treuer Diener des Imperators, bis zu meinem letzten Atemzug."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un öfkesi, Adeptus Arbites'in yasalarına olan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}sarsılmaz adanmışlığın{/d} karşısında paramparça olup dağılıyor.{/n} "Ne yaptım ben böyle? Karşıt görüşlerle Yargıcı'nın vazifesine leke sürdüm. Hayır, ben kâfir değilim. Son nefesime dek İmparator'un sadık bir hizmetkârıyım"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un öfkesi, Adeptus Arbites'in yasalarına olan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}sarsılmaz adanmışlığın{/d} karşısında paramparça olup dağılır.{/n} "Ne yaptım ben böyle? Karşıt görüşlerle Yargıcı'nın vazifesine leke sürdüm. Hayır, ben bir kâfir değilim. Son nefesime dek İmparator'un sadık bir hizmetkârıyım"

languages.text: {n}La rage de Solomorne fond comme neige au soleil face à votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}dévotion à toute épreuve{/d} envers le code de l'Adeptus Arbites.{/n} « Qu'ai-je fait... J'ai déshonoré mes devoirs d'arbitrator avec mes propos de dissentiment. Je ne suis pas un hérétique. Je resterai un fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur jusqu'à ma mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's rage crumbles into dust in the face of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your ironclad devotion{/d} to the code of the Adeptus Arbites.{/n} "What have I done... I have dishonoured the Arbitrator's duty with words of dissent. No, I am not a heretic — I am a faithful servant of the Emperor until my last breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}La rage de Solomorne fond comme neige au soleil face à votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}dévotion à toute épreuve{/d} envers le code de l'Adeptus Arbites.{/n} « Qu'ai-je fait... J'ai déshonoré mes devoirs d'arbitrator avec mes propos de dissentiment. Je ne suis pas un hérétique. Je resterai un fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur jusqu'à ma mort. »
